title: Universe/Geometry/StateElement
description: Function returning a state element between a center point and another point in a given axes. Any of the state types available in GODOT can be used here. See the configuration properties for details

center.description: First point, a point in the frames system

point.description: Second point, a point in the frames system

axes.description: Third point, a point in the frames system

stateType.description: Name of the state type to be computed, any of the state types available in godot::astro::StateType ( in Python, type help(godot.core.astro.StateType) for details )

mu.description: Gravitational parameter with units (e.g. km^3/s^2) for the computation of the state

index.description: Element in the state vector to be computed, from 0 to 5

wrapPiPi.description: Flag to indicate whether to wrap the output from -pi to pi (default false)
